verses.verse: A <S%H8605>Prayer<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. Bow <S%H5186>down<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H6030>hear<s%> me: for I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>. A Prayer: or, A Prayer, being a Psalm of David

<S%H8104>Preserve<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; for I am <S%H2623>holy<s%>: O thou my <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H3467>save<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> that <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in thee. holy: or, one whom thou favourest
Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>: for I <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto thee <S%H3117>daily<s%>. daily: or, all the day
<S%H8055>Rejoice<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>: for unto thee, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, do I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
For thou, <S%H136>Lord<s%>, art <S%H2896>good<s%>, and ready to <S%H5546>forgive<s%>; and <S%H7227>plenteous<s%> in <S%H2617>mercy<s%> unto all them that <S%H7121>call<s%> upon thee.
Give <S%H238>ear<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, unto my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>; and <S%H7181>attend<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>.
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>trouble<s%> I will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon thee: for thou wilt <S%H6030>answer<s%> me.
Among the <S%H430>gods<s%> there is none like unto thee, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>; neither are there any works like unto thy <S%H4639>works<s%>.

All <S%H1471>nations<s%> whom thou hast <S%H6213>made<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>; and shall <S%H3513>glorify<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
For thou art <S%H1419>great<s%>, and <S%H6213>doest<s%> wondrous <S%H6381>things<s%>: thou art <S%H430>God<s%> alone.

<S%H3384>Teach<s%> me thy <S%H1870>way<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in thy <S%H571>truth<s%>: <S%H3161>unite<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, with all my <S%H3824>heart<s%>: and I will <S%H3513>glorify<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
For <S%H1419>great<s%> is thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%> toward me: and thou hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H7585>hell<s%>. hell: or, grave

O <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H2086>proud<s%> are <S%H6965>risen<s%> against me, and the <S%H5712>assemblies<s%> of <S%H6184>violent<s%> men have <S%H1245>sought<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; and have not <S%H7760>set<s%> thee before them. violent: Heb. terrible

But thou, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, art a <S%H410>God<s%> full of <S%H7349>compassion<s%>, and <S%H2587>gracious<s%>, <S%H750>longsuffering<s%> <S%H639><s%>, and <S%H7227>plenteous<s%> in <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%>.

O <S%H6437>turn<s%> unto me, and have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon me; <S%H5414>give<s%> thy <S%H5797>strength<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of thine <S%H519>handmaid<s%>.

<S%H6213>Shew<s%> me a <S%H226>token<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%>; that they which <S%H8130>hate<s%> me may <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>: because thou, <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, hast <S%H5826>holpen<s%> me, and <S%H5162>comforted<s%> me.
